en.title: THE130 LION131
en.text: [in] A1 lion2 fell3 deeply4 in5 love6 with7 the8 daughter9 of10 a11 cottager12 and13 wanted14 to15 marry16 her;17 but18 her19 father20 was21 unwilling22 to23 give24 her25 to26 so27 fearsome28 a29 husband,30 and31 yet32 didn’t33 want35 to36 offend37 the38 Lion;39 so40 he41 hit42 upon43 the44 following45 expedient.46 He47 went48 to49 the50 Lion51 and52 said,53 “I54 think55 you56 will57 make58 a59 very60 good61 husband62 for63 my64 daughter:65 but66 I67 cannot68 consent69 to70 your71 union72 unless73 you74 let75 me76 draw77 your78 teeth79 and80 pare81 your82 nails,83 for84 my85 daughter86 is87 terribly88 afraid89 of90 them.”91 The92 Lion93 was94 so95 much96 in97 love98 that99 he100 readily101 agreed102 that103 this104 should105 be106 done.107 When108 once,109 however,110 he111 was112 thus113 disarmed,114 the115 Cottager116 was117 afraid118 of119 him120 no121 longer,122 but123 drove124 him125 away126 with127 his128 club.129
